Title: FM | Data fixes | 7.21.2020

Release Notes:
What's New
  • 55365 - Add Expense Entry Actions - The functionality allows the users with the DRS_HMGP_Projects_SubRecipient role the ability to perform the following actions on the HMGP Project:
    • Add Expense Entry
    • Add Revenue Entry
    • Add Notes
    • Manage Documents
    • Payment Request
    • Note: User retain the ability to initiate the Submit RFR
Title: Kanban Team | Weekly Release | Sprint 7.5 | 07.21.2020

Release Notes:
• Users with PF_Reviewer or PF_SPDMG will now see the associated FEMA Process Step for a Project to better track the work flow.
  • User with the PF-Everybody role
    • will now be able to view PF All Sites CL
    • view the history of signature actions taken for DDD and SoW/CE sign off.
  • User with role od assigned SPDMG
    • will have the ability to re-sign the DDD approval each time the the status of a DDD review is updated to Agree,Agree with comments or Not Required
    • will be able to re-sign the SOW/CE approval each time the the status of a PA SME review is updated to Agree,Agree with comments or Not Required
